column1: '''oiale''' is a [[Quenya]] adverb meaning "forever, eternally, in eternity,<ref>[[Parma Eldalamberon 17]]</ref> everlastingly"<ref>{{RGEO
column2: Namarie}}, line 14</ref>. It can also be used as a noun for "everlasting [?age]"<ref>{{HM
